Meet Our Founder

Akhilesh Kumar Panday

With over a decade of experience in education and technology, Akhilesh Kumar Panday founded PSC Classes with a vision to transform the way people learn and grow. His innovative approach to education combines traditional teaching methods with cutting-edge technology, making quality education accessible to everyone.

Under his leadership, PSC Classes has helped thousands of students achieve their career goals through comprehensive courses, personalized mentoring, and industry-relevant training programs.

+91 94532 57979
WhatsApp: +91 94532 57979
adpanday@pscclasses.com

Why Choose PSC Classes ?

We provide a complete learning experience with features designed to help you succeed

Comprehensive Curriculum

Access a wide range of courses designed by industry experts to provide relevant, up-to-date knowledge.

Flexible Scheduling

Choose between online learning and offline classes to fit your personal schedule and learning style.

Digital Certificates

Earn industry-recognized digital certificates upon course completion to showcase your achievements.

Easy Payment Options

Pay your fees conveniently with multiple payment methods including UPI, QR codes, and more.

Personalized Learning

Receive individualized attention with customized learning paths tailored to your goals.

Expert Instructors

Learn from experienced educators with real-world expertise in their respective fields.

Hands-on Practice

Apply your knowledge through practical exercises, projects, and real-world applications.

Career Support

Access career guidance, job placement assistance, and networking opportunities.

Our Excellent Staff

Meet our dedicated team of educators shaping futures at PSC Classes

Vandana Shukla

BCA, MCA
Computer Science Tuitor

A dedicated educator with expertise in computer science and technology. With her strong academic background in BCA and MCA, Vandana brings extensive knowledge and practical experience to the classroom.

Her teaching methodology focuses on combining theoretical concepts with hands-on practical applications, ensuring students develop both understanding and practical skills. She specializes in programming fundamentals, web development, and computer applications.

Known for her patient and thorough approach to teaching, she ensures every student grasps the concepts completely. Her students consistently achieve excellent results through her personalized attention and comprehensive teaching methods.

vandana.shukla@pscclasses.com
Contact Administration

Shalu Dwivedi

M.SC, B.Ed
Assistant Teacher

A passionate educator with a strong foundation in science and education. Her M.SC and B.Ed qualifications reflect her deep understanding of both subject matter and teaching methodologies.

She brings a unique blend of theoretical knowledge and practical teaching experience to the classroom, making complex concepts accessible and engaging for students.

Her student-centered approach and dedication to academic excellence have consistently helped students achieve their educational goals.

shalushukla@pscclasses.com
Contact Administration

Sheetal Tripathi

Graduate
Accountant Department

A dedicated professional serving as both an educator and the Accountant at PSC Classes. Her dual role brings a unique perspective to the institution's operations.

As an Accountant, she manages the financial aspects of PSC Classes with precision and professionalism, ensuring smooth administrative operations. Her organizational skills and attention to detail contribute significantly to the institution's efficient management.

In her teaching role, she creates an engaging learning environment where students feel comfortable asking questions and exploring new concepts. Her practical approach helps students grasp complex topics effectively.

sheetaltripathi@pscclasses.com
Contact Administration

Digital Certificate of Completion

Upon successful completion of your course, receive a verified digital certificate that showcases your achievement and validates your expertise.

Professional Recognition

Our certificates are recognized by industry professionals and demonstrate your commitment to skill development.

Verifiable Authenticity

Each certificate includes a unique QR code and verification link to prove its authenticity.

Instant Digital Access

Get immediate access to your digital certificate upon course completion, perfect for sharing on LinkedIn or your portfolio.
